```{=html}
<div class="card border-dark mb-3">
  <a href="/ResearchPages/warmingFRpage.qmd" class="link-primary"><img src="files/warmingfig1.jpg" alt="Figure 1 adapted from my JANE 2019 paper" class="card-img-top"/></a>
  <div class="card-body">
    <h5 class="card-title"> <strong>Warming can destabilize the predator–prey functional response</strong> </h5>
    <p class="card-text"> We investigated the impact of temperature on the functional response of a predator-prey pair. We found that it switched from a Type III to a Type II at the highest temperature. We used simulations to illustrate the destabilizing effect of this change.</p>
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary btn-sm"><a href="/ResearchPages/warmingFRpage.qmd" class="link-light text-decoration-none">Find out more</a></button>
  </div>
</div>
```


```{=html}
<div class="card border-dark mb-3">
  <a href="/ResearchPages/EcoComplexEcoForecast.qmd" class="link-primary"><img src="files/PhdChp1Fig1.jpg" alt="Figure 1 adapted from my ELE 2022 paper" class="card-img-top"/></a>
  <div class="card-body">
    <h5 class="card-title"> <strong>Forecasting the face of ecological complexity</strong> </h5>
    <p class="card-text"> We quantified how ecological complecity affectes forecast skill of species abundances within and across systems. We found that in general we forecasted generalist species (many but weak interactions) better than specialist species (few but strong interactions). </p>
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary btn-sm"><a href="/ResearchPages/EcoComplexEcoForecast.qmd" class="link-light text-decoration-none">Find out more</a></button>
  </div>
</div>
```
